enableLocalStorageAlert: Please enable the localStorage support in your browser, in order to use TagSpaces!
closingEditedFileConfirm: Any unsaved changes will be lost! Do you want to continue?
closingEditedFileContentConfirm: If you confirm, all the changes you made will be lost.
fileDeleteContentConfirm: The file __filePath__ will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered. Are you sure?
selectedFilesDeleteContentConfirm: All selected files '__selectedFiles__' will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered. Are you sure?
fileSaveContentConfirm: Do you want to overwrite the current file?
errorOpeningLocationAlert: Error occurred while opening a path! Currently opened location will be closed.
errorOpeningPathAlert: The desired path could not be opened.
openFileNativelyAlert: Open files natively is not implemented yet!
openContainingDirectoryAlert: Open directory functionality not implemented yet!
accessFileURLNotAllowedAlert: Please make sure that you check the 'Allow access to file URLs' checkbox in the extension settings of chrome/chromium ('chrome://extensions/'). TagSpaces can not read files from your local storage!
deleteTagGroupContentConfirm: Do you want to delete the tag group '__tagGroup__' ?
selectedLocationNameExistContentAlert: Selected location name is already in use!
selectedPathExistContentAlert: Selected path is already in use by a location!
deleteLocationContentAlert: Do you want to delete the Location '__locationName__'?
tagWithCurrentDate: Tag with current date (e.g. 20131208 for the 8th of December, 2013)
editTagNamesRestrictionsHelp: Tags should have a minimum length of 2 characters and should not contain special characters such as spaces, #, / ,\ and other.
cleanFilesContentConfirm: Do you really want to remove all tags from the selected files?
deleteDirectoryContentConfirm: Do you want to delete the directory '__dirPath__' ?
errorDeletingDirectoryAlert: Deleting failed. Directory probably not empty.
restoreDefaulSettingMessageConfirm: By restoring the default setting, all locations, tags and taggroups will be lost. Are you sure you want to continue?
switchLanguageHelp: Switching language will fully take effect after restarting the application
keyBindingInstructions1: For modifier keys you can use
keyBindingInstructions3: Any other key you should be able to reference by name like
keyBindingInstructions4: You can assign many keys to a single operation, simply by separating them by
perspectivesHelp: The changes made in this tab will take effect after restarting the application.
showUnixHiddenFiles: Show files/directories with a dot(.) in front of the name (e.g. Unix, Linux, OS X hidden files)
checkForNewVersion: Check for new version on startup
experimentalHelp: Experimental Functionality! Please be careful changing any of the following settings.
calculateTag: Calculate tags from the current search results
calculateTagHelp: Reduces the performance while browsing directories
tagDelimiter: Tag delimiter (e.g. Filename[TAG1_TAG2], _ is the delimiter)
prefixTagContainer: Prefix for the tag container (e.g. in 'Filename_[TAG1].txt', '_' is the prefix)
fileNameHelp: File name should be at least one character long and should not contain the following characters: # / \ : * ? " < > |
directoryNameHelp: Directory name should be at least one character long and should not contain the following characters: # / \ : * ? " < > |
locationNameHelp: Location name should be at least one character long
tagGroupNameHelp: Tag group name should be at least one character long
operationNotPermittedInEditModeAlert: This operation is not permitted because the document has been already changed.
useDefaultLocation: Use default location as a startup location
enablingUsingMetaFolder: Enable the use of a hidden folder(.ts) for storing meta data and thumbnails
writeMetaToSidecarFile: Use sidecar files in the hidden folders for saving meta data (e.g. tags)
useTrashCan: Move deleted files or folders to trash bin
invalidImportFile: The imported file has invalid format
loadLocationMetaData: Loads location meta data (currently only tag groups)
loadLocationMetaDataHelp: Location metadata file 'tsm.json' should be placed in the '.ts' subfolder of the current location. The file format should be the same as the exported tag groups file from the tab 'general'.
showTagAreaOnStartup: Always show tag area on startup
colorChangesToAllTags: Apply color changes to all tags of the group
